name: Explore the Gardens
description:
# Explore-The-Gardens
Search the gardens for gold and gems.

Adventure Game: Python and Pygame
  • This is a game that is an extension of Jack Whitworth's Dungeon Game
  • Link to His Repository
  • For the Windows game to work you may need to install vc_redist.x86.exe (Visual C++ Redistributable for Visual Studio 2015)
    • Most Windows machines have this but if you get a error when you run you may have to install.
    • Google "vc_redist.x86.exe" to find it at Microsoft.

Github Repository for this game: https://github.com/groeneveldwoodstock/Explore-The-Gardens
